name: medium-chrome-extension
description: This is an experiment chrome extension for medium.com

scripts.chrome-build: npm run chrome-manifest && cp -R js dist && cp -R css dist
scripts.chrome-pack: npm run chrome-build && mkdirp out && zip -rj out/chrome-octolinker-$npm_package_version.zip dist
scripts.chrome-open: npm run chrome-build && npm run chrome-launch --
